titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to permit payments under a State plan to certain vaccine manufacturers.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S583-584)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to permit payments under State Medicaid plans to certain manufacturers of childhood vaccines who have contracted with the State to provide them without charge to providers for administration to Medicaid-eligible individuals.
